description.narrative: The Nature Elements Asia Renewable Energy and Cleantech Fund, L.P. (the Fund) is a private equity fund that will invest in a diversified portfolio of clean energy and cleantech projects. The Fund will invest in China (estimated at approximately 80% of total investments) and other Asian countries including Vietnam, Thailand, Indonesia, and the Philippines (estimated at 20% of total investments). The Fund is targeting $200 million in commitments and will be managed by Nature Elements Capital (NECAP or the Manager).

participating-org.narrative: Nature Elements Asia Renewable Energy and Cleantech Fund LP

mailing-address.narrative:

Telephone: +852 3527 0978 Fax: +852 3694 1178

name.narrative: The Fund is to be formed as a Cayman Islands exempted limited partnership. The Fund Manager is also domiciled in the Cayman Islands. Its operations will be conducted from its Beijing, Chongqing, Hong Kong, and Singapore offices.

activity-description.narrative: A description that qualifies the activity taking place at the location.
